title: How to collect season chest
body:
So i started playing this game today and I got a popup that said "You or an ally has achieved s rank and earned a chest for the whole team"...or something like that. When I checked my rank WHIPPEEE S-. I went to my loot and ddint have a chest though...

how do I collect it?

Edit: at the bottom of the loot page it says I have 1 chest. I cant open it tho :(

replies.body:
You can get those chests by earning an S rank, or having someone on your team earn an S rank, and you'll get a chest as long as you own that champion. You can only get one for that champion per season though.

You'll need keys to open those chests as well. Playing games will get you key fragments randomly, and it takes 3 to form a key!

"or having someone on your team earn an S rank" 
this has to be a premade.
